about.details:
Incorporated in 2010, Bhakti Gems and Jewellery Ltd (BGJ) is the manufacturer, wholesaler and supplier of gold jewellery and has its headquartered at Ahmedabad, Gujarat. Company mainly focuses on traditional Indian jewellery.

Company's product range includes handmade gold jewellery studded with precious and semi precious stones such as diamond, ruby, cubic zirconia (cz) etc. The jewelleries are designed by it and manufactured on job work basis at Ahmedabad, Rajkot and Mumbai. BGJ is a customer-centric Company; with a prime focus on attain the utmost client satisfaction by offering them quality assured products. Company's major customers includes Kalyan Jewellers India Ltd, Soni Dwarksdas Virchand, Ghanshyam Jewellers etc.

contactDetails.full_address: Bhakti Gems and Jewellery Ltd, 209 Shree Balaji Paragon, B/S Rock Regency Hotel, Opp Axis Bank near Circle - P C.G Road

faqs.question: What is the Bhakti Gems and Jewellery IPO?
faqs.answer:
Bhakti Gems and Jewellery IPO is a SME IPO of 1962000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹3.92 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹20 per share. The minimum order quantity is 6000.

The IPO opens on May 17, 2017, and closes on May 22, 2017.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Bhakti Gems and Jewellery IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Bhakti Gems and Jewellery IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Bhakti Gems and Jewellery IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Bhakti Gems and Jewellery IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Bhakti Gems and Jewellery IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Bhakti Gems and Jewellery IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Bhakti Gems and Jewellery IPO opens on May 17, 2017 and closes on May 22, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Bhakti Gems and Jewellery IPO?
faqs.answer: Bhakti Gems and Jewellery IPO lot size is 6000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Bhakti Gems and Jewellery IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Bhakti Gems and Jewellery IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
